item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (160 points | 39 comments)
2. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (11 points | 2 comments)
3. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (36 points | 5 comments)
4. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (73 points | 23 comments)
5. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (83 points | 14 comments)
6. Official Raspberry Pi NVMe SSD Review (11 points | discuss)
7. Never Missing the Train Again (70 points | 21 comments)
8. Brush – a new super compatible Gaussian splatting engine in Rust (12 points | 2 comments)
9. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (52 points | 10 comments)
10. Post World War II Food (86 points | 54 comments)
11. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (22 points | 3 comments)
12. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (90 points | 37 comments)
13. Svix (YC W21) Is Hiring a Developer Marketer (US Remote) ( | hide)
14. Rider is now free for non-commercial use (527 points | 251 comments)
15. Show HN: PreCog AI – Automatic AI Model Selection for Any Task (24 points | 13 comments)
16. Cable companies ask 5th Circuit to block FTC's click-to-cancel rule (133 points | 78 comments)
17. Show HN: 2048 turned 10 this year, I built an updated version to celebrate (276 points | 123 comments)
18. Show HN: Desktop Sandbox for Secure Cloud Computer Use (15 points | 1 comment)
19. Throw more AI at your problems (42 points | 19 comments)
20. Dynamic Models of Gentrification (17 points | 4 comments)
21. Nonlinear Schrödinger numerical simulation in 3D (9 points | 2 comments)
22. Serge Semin's Goodbye to the Linux Kernel (21 points | 3 comments)
23. Calculating the norm of a complex number (18 points | 10 comments)
24. Why did you write a new RTOS for CHERIoT? (19 points | 4 comments)
25. BYD EV Teardown in Japan Reveals the Secret to Its Affordability (33 points | 30 comments)
26. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (378 points | 119 comments)
27. New Architecture is here (109 points | 92 comments)
28. How to grip Bronze Age swords (83 points | 71 comments)
29. Sinusoidal Sunlight (82 points | 28 comments)
30. Zero or Sign Extend (97 points | 20 comments)
